import React from "react"; import { Grid, Image, Container, Icon, Card, Divider } from "semantic-ui-react"; import charlotte from "./charlotte.jpg" import "./style.css"; const About = () => (

ABOUT

San Diego

Yes, my actual last name is Mountain. It can be pretty steep, but luckily I enjoy dad jokes. I am a southern california native, currently residing with my fianc√© and our cat. Pursuing the dream of becoming a Web Developer leveraging a background in customer service to build a more intuitive user experience on the web. Just trying to be the best cat mom I can be.

Recently earned a Certificate in Full Stack Development from the University of California San Diego Extension, with developed skills in JavaScript, CSS, Node.js, JQuery, MySQL and responsive web design. With each project, my aim is to best engage my audience for an impactful user experience. Excited to leverage my skills in the future as part of a fast-paced, quality-driven team!

); export default About;
